patterns: Where should I get breakfast in West Yellowstone?
Tell me about Running Bear Pancake House in West Yellowstone.
Best morning eats before heading into the park?
Is Running Bear Pancake House good for coffee or breakfast?
Any kid-friendly breakfast options near Yellowstone?
response: Try **Running Bear Pancake House** – Best breakfast in town Tip: Opens early—perfect for pre-park fuel-up. [Apple Maps](https://maps.apple.com/?q=Running+Bear+Pancake+House)

response: Try **Ernie’s Bakery & Deli** – Best grab-and-go breakfast and sandwiches Tip: Grab boxed lunches early—they sell out. [Apple Maps](https://maps.apple.com/?q=Ernies+Bakery+West+Yellowstone)
